verses.roman:
kīrtanīyāra pariśrama jāni' gaurarāya
tāṅ-sabāre khāoyāite prabhura mana dhāya

synonyms: kīrtanīyāra—of all the singers; pariśrama—labor; jāni'-knowing; gaurarāya—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāṅ-sabāre—all of them; khāoyāite—to fill; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; mana dhāya—the mind was very eager.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu understood the labor of all the kīrtana chanters; therefore He was very eager to feed them sumptuously.
